mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_sys_jpush_record ( jpush_id, `type`, relevance_id, request_param, response_param, created_by, created_date, updated_by, updated_date ) VALUES ( #{jpushId, jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{type, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{relevanceId, jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{requestParam, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{responseParam, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createdBy, jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{createdDate, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updatedBy, jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{updatedDate, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} )
